statements.query: MATCH (n:KMSKeyRingUser)<-[:USES]-(:GCPKMSKeyRing) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP KMS Key Ring Users that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:KMSKeyRingUser)<-[r:USES]-(:GCPKMSKeyRing) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP KMS Key Ring Users to KMS Key Ring  relationships that are out of date

name: Cleanup GCP KMS Key Ring Policy Users
